desc: Perfect floral gifts and bouquets from multiple award winning floral designer Dr. Solomon Leong. Flower studio situated at the heart of Central.

layout.text:
Show your loved ones how much you care for them with flowers from SOLOMON BLOEMEN!
We offer tailor-made bouquets and floral gifts for any occasions. Every piece we create is highly personalized and the flowers we use are of the best quality and the freshest available.
WE ONLY DO BEAUTIFUL
